author: Srivatsan Sridhar
title: Amazon Mobile Carnival: Lenovo Z2 Plus starting at Rs. 11999, Up to Rs. 10000 off on iPhones and more
text:
Youtube Amazon Mobile Carnival: Lenovo Z2 Plus starting at Rs. 11999, Up to Rs. 10000 off on iPhones and more 
Amazon has started its two-day Mobile Carnival to offers some great deals on smartphones. It said that it will offer up to Rs. 2,500 discount on Android smartphones in this sale. 
Best deal on smartphones on Amazon.in Moto G4 Play – Rs. 7,999 (Rs. 1,000 off) TCL 562 – Rs. 7,999 (Rs. 3,000 off) Samsung On5 Pro – Rs. 7,490 (Rs. 1700 off) 
Amazon also offers up to Rs. 10,000 off on iPhones. We have listed some best deals, check out the complete list on Amazon Mobile Carnival page here . 
All these are limited period offers that last today, March 29th and tomorrow, March 30th, Thursday only. Author: Srivatsan Sridhar Srivatsan Sridhar is a Mobile Technology Enthusiast who is passionate about Mobile phones and Mobile apps. He is currently using the Motorola Moto G4 Plus. You can follow him on Twitter @ssrivatsan and on Google+ View all posts by Srivatsan Sridhar
